articles.title: Huawei launches Pura 70 series equipped with Kirin 9010 chip · TechNode - TechNode
articles.description: On Thursday, Huawei unveiled a letter on the Chinese X-like social media platform Weibo to announce the Pura 70 Series Pioneer Program, a scheme for people to purchase devices from its latest mobile phone series without holding a launch event.
